com.octo.android.robospice.request.okhttp.simple
Class OkHttpBigBinaryRequest

java.lang.Object
  com.octo.android.robospice.request.SpiceRequest<T>

          com.octo.android.robospice.request.okhttp.simple.OkHttpBinaryRequest
              com.octo.android.robospice.request.okhttp.simple.OkHttpBigBinaryRequest
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<SpiceRequest<InputStream>>
public class OkHttpBigBinaryRequest
extends OkHttpBinaryRequest

Downloads big images in size. All data is passed to the listener using file system. This class is meant to help download big images. If you wish to download smaller documents, you would be better using OkHttpSmallBinaryRequest.

Author:
sni

Field Detail

cacheFile

protected File cacheFile
Constructor Detail

OkHttpBigBinaryRequest

public OkHttpBigBinaryRequest(String url,
                              File cacheFile)
Creates a OkHttpBigBinaryRequest using its own cache file to prevent any downloaded data to be stored in memory. All file received from the network (via a simple http GET request) will be stored directly in the cache file to prevent memory loss.

Parameters:
url - the url to get the image data from.
cacheFile - a file used to store image data. Developers will have to handle the cache file erasure by themselves. This cache file is not handled by RS caching mechanism in the "normal way".
